description: When Danielle decides to do a story on the life of a sex worker to please her boss and lover Peter, she meets Gage a professional gigolo. She quickly becomes interested in his work and starts to see a change in herself and her life.
keywords: simulated cunnilingus,male escort,sex with blindfolded woman,mistress,cheating husband
name: Life of a Gigolo

review.name: Female as the voyeur
review.reviewBody:
Its ok to watch, if you are a reporter? Especially, if you are a female reporter. So in order to boost circulation a female "investigative" reporter spies on the various customers of a male gigolo. Sometimes she gets involved in the action. Eventually, she gets too involved.

Most of the girls in this flick are absolutely delicious and, of course, are nude often and for long periods of time. Despite the porno flavor of it all, some back plot lines keep it slightly above others in this genre.
